nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: Blessings upon you, little {person_traveler}. {action_welcome} to our humble {location_church}. Are you feeling lost in our {location_town}?

options.text: Yes, I am a little lost.

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: Do not worry. This is the {location_church}, a {location_place} of peace. The {location_saloon} is to the {direction_west}. The {location_bank} is to the {direction_east}. It is a simple layout.

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: It is a {quality_good} {location_town} to {action_explore} in. The {location_church} is always open. Our people form a strong {concept_community}.

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: So you can {action_find} your way, let me ask a simple {concept_question}. The {concept_sun} sets in the...?

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: The {concept_sun} is the big, bright star in the sky during the day. It gives us light and warmth.

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: No, my child. The {concept_sun} rises in the {direction_east} and sets in the {direction_west}. But it is an easy mistake. The desire to {action_learn} is what matters.

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: That is right. You are an observant {person_person}. You {action_see} the world around you.

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: Your journey must be {quality_long}. Your clothes look worn. We in this {concept_community} {action_help} each other. Please, {action_take} these clean {item_trousers}.

nodes.speaker: Sister Agatha
nodes.text: May your path be safe. Remember, the doors of this {location_church} are always open to a {quality_kind} {person_friend}.
